meanings.definition: A person who trains or teaches others.
meanings.sent1: The trainer helped the students learn new skills.
meanings.sent2: The basketball trainer worked with the team on shooting techniques.
meanings.sent3: The trainer told a joke during class to keep the students engaged.
meanings.sent4: She was a trainer of young minds, shaping the future generation.
meanings.sent5: The trainer's passion for teaching was evident in every lesson.

meanings.definition: A shoe designed for athletic training.
meanings.sent1: He put on his new trainers before heading to the gym.
meanings.sent2: The runners wore their trainers for the marathon.
meanings.sent3: The bright red trainers stood out among the other shoes.
meanings.sent4: Her trainers carried her swiftly through the race.
meanings.sent5: The comfortable trainers provided support during the workout.

meanings.definition: A device used to train animals.
meanings.sent1: The dog trainer used a clicker as a training tool.
meanings.sent2: The horse responded well to the trainer's gentle guidance.
meanings.sent3: The parrot found the trainer's whistle amusing.
meanings.sent4: The lion tamer's whip was a powerful trainer in the circus.
meanings.sent5: The dolphin trainer used positive reinforcement to teach new tricks.
